resources.string:
1 Serbest Mod
 2 Uçağı Takip Et
 3 Rotasyonu Kilitle
 4 Sıfırlamak için Tıkla
10, 30 ve 90 saniyede düzlem konumunun tahmini (geçerli hız ve yöne göre)

Nasıl bağlanırım?
    The app needs an IP address of your computer running War Thunder, how to get your IP see http://ip.junkcode.net 


I did enter IP and it still says "No connection"
    There might be problem with your local network routing see http://ip.junkcode.net/help 


It still doesn't connect!
    You didn't read http://ip.junkcode.net/help, did you?

I donated, where is my code?
    You should receive code to your email within few minutes after donation, if not contact support@junkcode.net 


I entered code but nothing is unlocked
    Try restarting the app

" I don't like something
    Let us know what - http://junkcode.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=14 


Bir Hata Buldum!
    Post it here http://github.com/JunkCode/wtTactMap/issues?state=open 


Yeni özellik için bir fikrim var
    Let us know what - http://junkcode.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=14 


I want to help with translation/icons/...
    Some of the resources are already here http://github.com/JunkCode/wtTactMap You can propose modification or add new things. If you have any question or other ideas let us know - http://junkcode.net/forum/viewforum.php?f=14
